rows.label: qst104905_msg0001
rows.name:
Please make sure to remember
every last detail of your fight.

rows.label: qst104905_msg0002
rows.name:
I'll be furiously writing
down notes using your
description as reference!

rows.label: qst104905_msg0101
rows.name:
I'd much prefer if a handsome
young gentleman were to
defeat those monsters...

rows.label: qst104905_msg0102
rows.name:
Well, I don't suppose it matters if
someone else fights them. Just make
sure your narrator is a pretty one...
